meta.title: Tunkhannock Area School District :: School Consolidation Info

meta.name: generator

body.div: JavaScript Disabled. For a better experience on this website please enable JavaScript in your browser.

div.p: Children's Produce Market Tuesday May 5th, 4pm to 6pm at the Tunkhannock High School.
Registration via facebook or calling 836-3111 x1000 required by Thursday April 30th at 11am.
Only requirement is having a preschool through 12th grade student living in the Tunkhannock School District.

p.span: 1-877-PA-HEALTH (24/7) if you have any questions about the COVID-19 or any Public Health question.
If you are registering your child for kindergarten for the 2020-2021 school year, please send the following information to

Student's name, parent's name, address, phone number, date of birth, M/F (male/female). Please send this information by Friday, May 15th. If you cannot email, please call (570)836-3111 ext. 1301 and leave the above information in a voicemail. Please be aware this is only step one of the registration process. Thank you!

li.a: TASD Learning Opportunity and Community Training

div.a: May Tunkhannock Area School District consolidation report

div.span: Please complete the attached survey for any questions, suggestions, comments and/or ideas. Your feedback will go directly to Dr. Kelly Carroll, Executive Director of School Consolidation

In the coming weeks, transition teams will be created for each school building in the district to assist with the school consolidation. Parents, community members, students, teachers and staff are invited to participate. If interested in becoming a part of the transition team at…
div.div: In the coming weeks, transition teams will be created for each school building in the district to assist with the school consolidation. Parents, community members, students, teachers and staff are invited to participate. If interested in becoming a part of the transition team at your school, please contact Dr. Kelly Carroll at kelly.carroll@tasd.net or 570-836-8219.

li.a: TASD Learning Opportunity and Community Training

p.span: To contact the webmaster, please email techsupport@tasd.net
